comments:
Eclipse 3.3RC1 I20070517-1700

Quite regularly I'm getting into situation when Eclipse refuses to start with the following exception in the log. Erasing workspace always helps, but this means loosing all the settings.

Could you attach a complete .log file(s)? It is in the ".metadata" directory of the workspace.

Also when you are unable to start Eclipse, have you tried "-clean" option? It would be interesting to see if it helps.

-clear does not help.
What does help is removing perforce plugin. This issue seems to be another manifestation of bug 190859. It's quite amazing that perforce plugin is not on the stack anywhere.

(In reply to comment #3)
> -clear does not help.
> What does help is removing perforce plugin. This issue seems to be another
> manifestation of bug 190859. It's quite amazing that perforce plugin is not on
> the stack anywhere.

To clarify, you tried -clean not -clear, correct?
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 190859 ***
